name: Virtual Families - Super Dad
description:
But don’t be fooled--the suburbs aren’t easy! Perform difficult tasks to take care of your family. Cook and bake in the kitchen. Barbecue in the backyard. Clean the living room. Go on a searching mission to find essential tools like the vacuum! Don’t forget to groom, feed, walk, and play with your pets. Try to prevent disasters from destroying your home! Prevent fires and floods. Multi-task to get it all done under the time limit!


In this amazing game you have to complete the given tasks to progress to the next levels, which increase in difficulty as you progress. 3D Models, perfect control, interesting tasks, a cool family, realistic art, and an awesome soundtrack are all going to lead you on a new journey of excitement.

Main Features:
• High Quality 3D Graphics
• Awesome Sounds
• Addicting RPG family game
• Exciting and enticing missions to complete
• Smooth and Easy Controls
• Super Cool house environment
• Realistic Life simulation
